text: Bhai koi aisa device rhta jisse mai thume pdhai krte ghr se bhi dhekta (to get the motivation and discipline...wow)....You have many qualities to be admired by anybody....I think tmne secretely UPSC ka revision bhi kr liya hai Hopefully we will meet very soon...aur haa ek aur baat....Kuch bhi kr lena but professor mt banna (bechare bacche...) ðŸ˜‚
author: Rahul  Chandra

text:
Yoo Laali.....See the Positivity....Cadre bhi soch rakha hai...wo bhi aachi waliðŸ˜‚.....Koi na Hopefully jispr tm abhi phigli ho usse jldi breakup hoga gyega thumara nd fir wo old upsc ke liye thodi massakat kr ke paa lena(Then bdi wali 2 partyy krenge..ek first break up ka and new relationship kaðŸ˜‚).....Sadly hmara ek hi course common rha hmara wo bhi tmne paar lga diya (as expected XD)....Always liked your fun loving...jolly nature....Iss attitude ko always saath rakhna....Lots of good wishes for your future...
Bye Bye
author: Rahul  Chandra

text: Hey Suarab... I think hmari friendship ki beginning common department se hu...Can't beliveÂ itni strong ho gyagiÂ hmari dosti. I could definitely say you are my theÂ  CLOSEST friend I have ever had in my life, and Â future me sayad hi koi aisa bnda mile jispr mai inna trust kr skta hu...It would be difficult to encapsulate our journey in these few words...Mere college jitne be memories bne... would be incomplete without you....We might have our share of disagreement on some issues(pets)....But abbÂ wo bhi mere funny memories bn gyeÂ hai....I really miss wo F2 terrance pr open sky ki niche ki discussions. Your positive attitude towardsÂ anything is what I admire in you the most...Thank you for motivating me, understanding me when no one could...Thank you for everything....Apni innocence aise hi bna kr rakhan...Hopefully, we will remain in touch for the rest of our life...P.S. No matter what...something still remains unfulfilledÂ in life and the best way is to move on XD
author: Rahul  Chandra

text: Hey Saurab... I think hmari friendship ki beginning common department se hu...Can't belive itni strong ho gyagi hmari dosti. I could definitely say you are my the  CLOSEST friend I have ever had in my life, and  future me sayad hi koi aisa bnda mile jispr mai inna trust kr skta hu...It would be difficult to encapsulate our journey in these few words...Mere college jitne be memories bne... would be incomplete without you....We might have our share of disagreement on some issues(pets)....But abb wo bhi mere funny memories bn gye hai....I really miss wo F2 terrance pr open sky ki niche ki discussions. Your positive attitude towards anything is what I admire in you the most...Thank you for motivating me, understanding me when no one could...Thank you for everything....Apni innocence aise hi bna kr rakhan...Hopefully, we will remain in touch for the rest of our life...P.S. No matter what...something still remains unfulfilled in life and the best way is to move on XD
author: Rahul  Chandra
